document.full_text: the stock market is faring better than it did after the early 1970s recession. but by most other measures, the current recovery is far weaker.
document.title: off the charts: a recovery less robust than in the '70s
lines_and_colors: the stock market is faring better than it did after the early 1970s recession. but by most other measures, the current recovery is far weaker.
